items.title: Exclusive: Learn all 14 Babbel languages for one lifetime price
items.summary:
Learning a new language can feel like a significant commitment, months of classes, endless apps, and pricey subscriptions that seem to go on forever. But what if you could skip the recurring costs and unlock all 14 languages Babbel offers for life? With this exclusive offer, you can get lifetime access to Babbel’s award-winning app for a one-time payment of $159 (MSRP 299) with code LEARN.

items.title: Just $6.50 gets you this 100W 3.3-foot USB-C cable that neatly retracts into its shell when not in use (48% off)
items.summary:
Baseus 100W 3.3-foot Retractable USB-C Cable in black

Buy for $6.50 (Reg. $13)

Enter promo code 3Z7D9EHG for $3.29 off.

What we love

This 3.3-foot 100W USB-C charging cable sports a retractable design that coils neatly into a compact case, making it perfect for travel or everyday carry. It’s a simple fix for tangled, messy cords that often take up too much space and are inconvenient to pack. It’s also available in several colors and a longer 6.6-foot version for added reach, all of which are on sale right now, though with relatively smaller discounts.

items.title: Keep up to five devices running with UGREEN’s Nexode 48,000mAh 300W power bank at $102 (Reg. $170), more
items.summary:
By way of its official Amazon storefront, UGREEN is offering its Nexode 48,000mAh Portable Charger/Power Bank Station at $101.99 shipped. You’d normally have to pay $170 for this larger charging solution at full price, though Prime members have been getting the opportunity to grab it at $120 and $113 rates over the last few months, alongside occasional dips lower to $107 and $102 – the latter of which is what we saw it priced at for July’s Prime Day event. You’re looking at a 40% markdown here, which cuts $68 off the going rate for the second-best price we have tracked – just $2 above the one-time low we saw at the end of March. Be sure to head below for a rundown on this model’s capabilities, as well as other UGREEN charging solutions currently seeing discounts.

items.title: Anthropic raised a $13B Series F led by Iconiq, Fidelity, and Lightspeed at a $183B valuation, up from $61.5B in March, and reports a $5B+ run-rate revenue (Anthropic)
items.summary:
Anthropic:
Anthropic raised a $13B Series F led by Iconiq, Fidelity, and Lightspeed at a $183B valuation, up from $61.5B in March, and reports a $5B+ run-rate revenue  —  Anthropic has completed a Series F fundraising of $13 billion led by ICONIQ.  This financing values Anthropic at $183 billion post-money.

Missing out on this deal means you’ll likely be paying $1,699 when it reverts to its full price, which we’ve mostly seen dropping to $1,499 over the last year, though its been more regularly falling back to the $1,399 low since the launch of its upgraded Sinch 2.5 descendant. You’re looking at a $300 markdown while the sale lasts, giving you another opportunity to score the brand’s most popular space-saving model at the best tracked price.

items.title: Secure a copy of Luigi’s Mansion 2 HD for Switch down at $45 before next month, more
items.summary:
Today we are touching back down with the ongoing Woot Switch game sale to highlight Luigi’s Mansion 2 HD. This wonderful classic remake is the perfect game to have in your library as we approach the spookiest month of the year and now might be a good time to score it while you can grab a copy down at $44.99 Prime shipped (a $6 delivery fee will apply otherwise). Regularly $60, this is one of the games that continually goes in and out of stock in the ongoing Woot sale and you can indeed secure a copy now before Halloween. Many folks are expecting Nintendo to unleash the classic GameCube Luigi title for Switch 2 Online members ahead of Halloween this year, but nothing is confirmed yet and this Switch remake of Luigi’s Mansion 2 is the perfect companion experience anyway.
